Citizen CH 453 Upper Arm Bp Monitor (White) Price: Rs.1650

Key Features

  • 90 Readings Memory
Blood Pressure issues are one of the most pervasive illnesses attributed to modern civilization; hence keeping a BP monitor at home becomes important. A complete automatic measurement with precise and quick readings facilitated by the Citizen CH 453 BP Monitor could monitor and avoid health problems related to blood pressure.

This automatic CH 453 BP monitor by Citizen features an Irregular heartbeat indicator that detects abnormal heartbeats along with your blood pressure readings. The BP monitor also provides a body movement indicator that indicates your body movement thus averting the chance of inaccurate readings.

Build

The Citizen monitor is stylish and modern yet offers comfort and ease of use. The main unit comes with a one touch operation control button and a clear LCD display that shows both systolic/diastolic pressure readings and pulse rates simultaneously. This digital BP monitor provides a non-integrated medium sized cuff that auto inflates to an ideal level. You just simply have to wrap the cuff around your arm and press the easy one touch button. In seconds your blood pressure and pulse rates are displayed on the LCD panel.

Performance and Features

This digital Citizen upper arm BP monitor is supported by a digital sensor that enables automatic inflation and deflation hence consistently providing quick and accurate results. The inbuilt rolling motor pump allows the BP monitor to offer quiet inflation. Vested with an automatic memory feature the Citizen CH 453 BP monitor is capable of saving up to 90 sets of readings thus helping you track the history of your blood pressure readings over time. The monitor is also capable of displaying an average reading on the three most recent measurements.

An added advantage of this digital Citizen BP monitor is its automatic power off function that automatically shuts down the monitor when not in use. This saves the power of the monitor thus enhancing battery longevity. The BP monitor shows readings ranging from 0 to 280 mmHg for pressure readings and 40 to 180 beats/minute. The efficacy of the BP monitor is regulated at +/-3 mmHg for pressure and +/-5% of reading for pulse progress. The Citizen CH 453 BP monitor is powered by 4 AA batteries with an option of using AC adaptors as an alternate power source.

Key Features

  • 90 Readings Memory
Citizen CH 452 BP Monitor could be an answer to those on the look for a simple and affordable home blood pressure monitor they can rely on. This Citizen upper arm BP monitor uses the Oscillometric method and operates automatically to provide quick and precise readings that are displayed digitally. The Citizen BP Monitor features an Automatic power off function that enhances battery longevity as the monitor automatically switches off when not in use.

Build

Intended to bring about maximal comfort and ease the automatic CH 452 BP monitor is crafted with simplicity. The monitor has two components comprising of the measuring unit and the non-integrated cuff. The measuring unit has a clear LCD display that provides digitized readings and control buttons which direct the operation of the monitor.

The CH 452 BP monitor comes with a non-integrated medium sized cuff that are easily attached to the arm. The whole process of taking your blood pressure is very simple and easy. Once you fasten the cuff to your arm and press the control button the monitor measures your pressure automatically hence producing genuine readings in no time.

Performance and Feature

This BP monitor by Citizen is supported by a sensor technology that detects your pulse enabling the cuff to inflate and deflate automatically. This delivers precise and quick display of your pressure readings. The Citizen BP monitor displays a range of 0 to 280mmHg for pressure and 40 to 180 beats/minute for pulse readings. The accuracy rate is regulated at +/-3 mmHg and +/-5% of reading for pressure and pulse rates respectively.

The electronic Citizen CH 452 BP monitor incorporates an automatic memory feature that allows you to capture 90 readings. You can save your reading to track your blood pressure variations over time. The BP monitor is also capable of calculating the average of your last three readings. The Digital Citizen BP monitor operates with 4 AAA batteries but you also have the option of using AC adaptors which can be plugged into the wall source.

Key Features

  • Movement Indicator
Taking action to manage your blood pressure can help you prevent many possible diseases and stay healthy in the future. The Citizen CH 456 BP monitor could be your first step towards leading a healthier lifestyle. This upper arm BP monitor operates automatically delivering genuine readings in just a matter of few seconds.

The Citizen CH 456 upper arm BP monitor is vested with an Irregular heartbeat indicator and a Body movement detector. The Irregular heartbeat indicator identifies abnormal heartbeats. At the same time the body movement detector senses movement of the body or unit thus avoiding incorrect readings and giving you authentic and precise readings.

Build

Engineered to function with comfort this Citizen BP monitor is simple and intuitive when it comes to its operation. Bestowed with a user friendly interface the monitor has a large and clear easy to read LCD display and one touch operation control buttons.

The monitor comes with a medium sized cuff that can be safely kept in the cuff holder when not in use. The cuff is non-integrated and allows easy positioning therefore making it easy for you to attach it to your arm.

Performance and Features

Supported with an inbuilt digital sensor and pump this automatic upper arm BP monitor inflates and deflates the cuff at an ideal level thus enabling authentic readings in a digitized form. The Citizen CH 456 BP monitor sports an automatic memory feature that can recall up to 90 sets of readings with averaging capabilities for the last three readings. This helps you track your blood pressure and pulse progress over a period of time.

This arm BP monitor also features an auto-off function that automatically shuts down the monitor if the monitor is idle for more than 3 minutes. The BP monitor can display a range from 0 to 280 mmHg for pressure readings and 40 to 180 beats/minute for pulse rates. The accuracy rate of the monitor stands at +/-3 mmHg for pressure readings and +/-5% of reading for pulse progress. This monitor is powered by 4 AA batteries. You also have the option of using an AC adaptor (Adaptor to be bought seperately) that allow you to measure your blood pressure without having to worry about the amount of remaining charge in the batteries.
